precaution: Remove any items from the table that you could knock off.
instruction: Sit at the table with a bowl containing an apple, a lemon, and a banana in front of you.
Place your right hand near the bowl.
Use your left hand to stabilize the bowl if needed
Use your right hand to pick up the apple from the bowl.
Place the apple gently on the table.
Use your right hand to pick up the lemon from the bowl.
Gently place the lemon on the table next to the apple.
Place your right hand on the table to take some rest for about 15 seconds.
Pick up the banana using your right hand.
Place the banana on the table next to the other fruits.
